layer.name: Order
layer.definition: Reality has patterns that can be discovered and used.

questions.text: The body operates according to discoverable principles ...

answers.4: mostly — there are reliable patterns for physical health
answers.5: absolutely — the body follows consistent, knowable laws
answers.3: partially — some principles work, others don't

questions.text: Nutrition, sleep, and environment affect the body in predictable ways ...

answers.4: usually — cause and effect in physical health is fairly reliable
answers.5: consistently — the body responds predictably to how we treat it
answers.2: possibly — but the connections seem weak
answers.3: sometimes — some inputs have clear effects, others don't
answers.1: not really — it's all individual variation

questions.text: The body's consistent response to good or poor treatment shows ...

answers.4: significant order — treatment generally produces predictable results
answers.5: clear evidence of physical order — you reap what you sow
answers.2: weak patterns — but with too many exceptions
answers.3: some order — but it's not totally reliable
answers.1: nothing — some people abuse their bodies and thrive

questions.text: The idea that the body is random or 'anything goes' for health is ...

answers.4: mostly wrong — the body follows rules we can learn
answers.5: completely wrong — physical health is highly ordered and knowable
answers.2: partly true — so much is out of our control
answers.3: mixed — some things matter, others don't seem to
answers.1: mostly true — health is largely luck

questions.text: Physical health can be studied, understood, and pursued systematically ...

answers.5: absolutely — the path to physical health is mappable
answers.2: somewhat — but mostly you just hope for the best
answers.3: partially — some aspects can be systematized, others can't
answers.1: not really — it's too complex and individual

remediation.advice: If physical health feels mysterious, study it. The body follows laws — chemistry, biology, physics. What you eat, how you sleep, what environment you create — these interact with predictable patterns. The order is there to be discovered.

scripture.text: Or do you not know that your body is a temple of the Holy Spirit within you, whom you have from God?
